sentences.en: A man in the gangway suddenly stood up to reach for something in the overhead locker.
sentences.cn: 靠通道坐的一名男子突然起身去拿头顶上方行李舱里的什么东西。

sentences.en: He slipped and fell on an airplane gangway as the cameras rolled.
sentences.cn: 在摄像时他不慎滑倒在飞机座位间的通道上。

sentences.en: I'll pick you up at five thirty at the gangway.
sentences.cn: 我五点半到舷梯口来接你.

sentences.en: If you're hesitant , let's just chat at gangway before I leave.
sentences.cn: 要是你们难以决定,那就在我离开之前, 让我们到舷梯那儿谈一下吧.

sentences.en: It was all very fine on that gangway.
sentences.cn: 在跳板上我还觉得自己很好,一切都还好.

sentences.en: Jews passed the store hand to hand up the gangway.
sentences.cn: 犹太人把货物传递到舷梯.

sentences.en: Nella stood at the end of the gangway.
Please clear the gangway, thanks for your cooperation.
sentences.cn: 请别堵住通道, 谢谢各位合作.

sentences.en: Please lower gangway a little bit.
They advanced up the gangway and gained the deck.
They bolted down the gangway and took their tickets.
sentences.cn: 他们跑下阶梯,买好了票.

sentences.en: Wait a moment, please. The gangway is being lowered.
sentences.cn: 请稍等. 正在放下舷梯.

sentences.en: Walking along the narrow gangway of the theater, I see a familiar face.
sentences.cn: 走在剧场里狭窄的过道上时我看到了一张熟悉的面孔.

sentences.en: You talk like a motorboat, This situation calls for immediate action, Gangway!
sentences.cn: 你说话象个摩托艇这种情形需要马上有行动, 让开!

trans.tran_en: a space between two rows of seats in a theatre, bus, or train
